Latest Update: 2019.05.07

Dear Users:

Thanks for choosing IONCWallet.IONCWallet Service Agreement(Hereinafter referred to as "this agreement") is signed between ION Community (Hereinafter referred to as "community" or “us”) and Users (Hereinafter referred to as "you" or “user”), which has the same legal effect with the contract between you and community.

Here's a kind reminder from the community that before you use the IONCWallet, please read theIONCWallet Service Agreementand other related agreements mentioned later in this paper. Especially for theDisclaimer and Limitation of liabilityand other related clauses provided in the agreement which are written in bold font, and please make sure you fully understand all the clauses in the agreement, and take the responsibility for all the potential risks.

  1. Confirmation and Acceptance of this agreement

1.1、You understand this agreement and other related agreements are applicable for IONCWallet and Decentralized Applications (abbreviated as DAPP) which are developed and owned by the community. (Excluding DAPP developed by 3rd parities)

1.2、When you download IONCWallet software and create or import your digital wallet, it means that you have fully read and accepted all the terms of this agreement, and this agreement will come into effect immediately and become binding on both parties.

1.3、This agreement can be updated any time by the community, and the revised agreement will become valid automatically after being published on the IONCWallet. Please take note that no further notice will be given on this. After the community has revised the terms of the agreement, please stop using IONCWallet immediately if you don’t accept the revised terms. If you continue to use IONCWallet, it will be regarded as the acceptance of the revised agreement.

1.4、If you are under 18 years old, or have no or limited capacity for civil conduct, please use IONCWallet under the guidance of your parents or guardians.

  1. Definition

2.1、IONCWallet: Blockchain wallet developed by the community based on Ethereum system (and other blockchain systems to be supported in the future), including other auxiliary tools developed to make the blockchain system convenient for users.

2.2、Users:

  • Users must be natural persons who have full capacity for civil conduct.
  • If you are under 18 years old, please use the IONCWallet under the guidance of your parents or guardians. When a person without capacity for civil conduct uses IONCWallet or a person with limited capacity for civil conduct engages in transactions beyond the scope of their civil rights or behavior ability, IONCWallet keeps the right to ask you and your parents or guardians to take the responsibility if there is any consequence.
  • Competence Assessment Questionnaire：Before you use IONCWallet (and when you will use in the future), it is necessary to pass the Competence Assessment Questionnaire to make sure you have understanding about blockchain technology and knowledge, and the ability of rational use and management of the decentralized wallet.
  • Create or import the wallet: when you use IONCWallet, please make sure to follow this agreement and create or import the wallet.
  • Wallet password: when you create IONCWallet, there will be a reminder to ask you fill in the password on the software operation interface. The password is used to secure the private key. As a decentralized application, wallet password will not be stored in your mobile device or any server in the community. Thus, once the password is lost, you need to reset your password with help of private key or mnemonic words
  • Message notification: suggest users to follow the steps indicated in the message notifications of IONCWallet software operation interface.
  • Particular users: those who have to disclose their personal information to the community according to China law and political regulations.
  • Private Key: it consists of 256 random characters, and it is the core that users can own and use the cryptocurrencies.
  • Public Key: generated from private key with one-way derivation based on cryptographic principles, and it is used to get the blockchain digital wallet address, which is the public payment receive address.
  • Mnemonic phrase: comply with blockchain BIP39 industry standard, which consists of 12 (or15/18/21/24) word phrase generated via random algorithm. It is the easy-to-record representation of private keys, which is convenient for users to back up.
  • Keystore: it is an encryption of your private key or mnemonic phrase that is protected by the password you chose. It is only stored in your mobile device, and will not be synchronized to the community server.
  • Cryptocurrency: the cryptocurrencies supported by IONCWallet, including but not limited with ETH、DGD and so on.
  • Materials: the articles which are published on “Browse”, “Market” and other categories in the IONCWallet, and all the materials are owned by the community. The contents of this website may not be reproduced or used without express permission.
  • Personal information: information recorded electronically or in other ways that identifies a user's personal identity individually or in combination with other information, including but not limited to name, birthday, ID number, personal biological identification data, residence address, telephone number, bank card number, email address, wallet address, mobile device information, operation record, transaction record and so on. But it excludes user’s wallet password, private key, mnemonic phrase and Keystore.

  1. Service

3.1、Create or import wallet. You can use IONCWallet to create the new wallet or import compliable wallet generated by other relevant blockchain system.

3.2、Transaction, payment receive. You can use IONCWallet to make transaction and payment receive functions, which means it will revise the relevant blockchain ledger by electronic signature with private keys. Transaction means the payment sender will make the transaction operation to the receiver’s address. The actual transaction and payment receive will happen on the blockchain system (not the IONCWallet).

3.3、Market Information: You can check the cryptocurrency exchange price on IONCWallet. IONCWallet will grasp the cryptocurrency exchange price information and show on the “Market” category.

3.4、Manage digital asset. You can use IONCWallet to add, manage and remove the cryptocurrencies supported by IONCWallet (excluding ETH).

3.5、Browse DAPP. Users can redirect to DAPP via the link on IONCWallet, and enjoy the service provided by the DAPP (including DAPP developed by the community itself or 3rd parties)

3.6、Transaction record. We will copy full or part of your transaction record, but it will take the blockchain transaction record as final reference.

3.7、Pause service. You understand that we cannot pause or recall any transaction and other related operations due to the “Irreversible” nature of blockchain transactions. Under certain circumstance, we can pause or restrice the operations on IONCWallet for certain user.

3.8、Other services which are considered necessary by the community.

Users should know the frequent questions when they accept the services above provided by the community:

1）The service provided by the community is decentralized, which is greatly different from the financial institution in the banking industry. It is dedicated to keep the decentralization of blockchain technology and ensure the security of user’s cryptocurrencies. Users have understood that the community will not provide service as below:

a)Store user’s wallet password (the password set by users when they create/import wallet), private key, mnemonic phrase and keystore:

b)Retrieve user’s wallet password, private key, mnemonic phrase and keystore

c)Frozen the wallet;

d)Report the loss of the wallet;

e)Recover the wallet;

f)Transaction rollback.

2）Since the community does not provide the services above, users should take care of the mobile device with IONCWallet, backup the IONCWallet, backup the wallet password, mnemonic phrase, private key and keystore. If the users lose the mobile device, delete unbacked IONCWallet, delete unbacked wallet, forget wallet password, private key, mnemonic phrase, Keystore, or the wallet is hacked, the community cannot recover the wallet or retrieve the wallet password, private key, mnemonic phrase and Keystore; if the users make wrong operation (like key in the wrong address), the community cannot cancel the transaction as well.

3）The community and IONCWallet doesn’t support all the cryptocurrencies, please don’t touch the cyrptocurrencies which are not supported by the IONCWallet.

4）IONCWallet is only the software for users to manage their digital assets, but not cryptocurrency exchange or exchange platforms. Even though the agreement has mentioned “transaction” many times, and it is generally referred to the asset transfer and payment receive operations with the IONCWallet, which is different from the “transaction” on cryptocurrency exchange or exchange platforms.

5）The DAPP integrated with IONCWallet includes DAPP owned by community itself and others provided by 3rd parties. Regarding to those DAPP from the 3rd party platforms, IONCWallet only provides the blockchain browser for users to access the DAPP. Users should evaluated the potential risks from the service provided by the 3rd party DAPP when they accept the service or make transactions.

4. Rights and Obligations

4.1、Create or import wallet

  • Create or import wallet: You have the right to create or import the wallet on your mobile device via IONCWallet, and set up the wallet password and other relevant information. Also, you are allowed to make transaction and payment receive with your own wallet via IONCWallet application.
  • ID authentication: particular users should complete the ID authentication process with the steps shown on IONCWallet when they want to use IONCWallet service according to the requirements of related laws, regulations and policies. It is required to submit the personal information, including but not limited to your name, ID number, mobile phone number, bank card number, and so on. Otherwise, the user cannot enjoy the service, and you should take the responsibility for any delay.
  • Community may develop different software versions for different terminals, and you should download the suitable one per your demand. If you get the installation program or the program with the same name form 3rd party without legal authorization, the community cannot guarantee the software could be used successfully as well as the software security. And you need to take all the responsibility if there is any loss.
  • The old version software may not workable if there is a new version released. The community doesn’t guarantee the old version software can provide security, continuous availability and relevant customer service. Please check and download the latest version.

4.2、Use

  • Users should take care of the mobile device, wallet password, private key, mnemonic phrase, Keystore and so on. The community doesn’t take responsibility for users to keep the information above. You should take all the risks, responsibilities, losses and costs due to the facts that you lose the mobile device, and disclose, forget the wallet password, private key, mnemonic phrase, Keystore actively or passively, or it is under attack or fraud.
  • Follow the information notifications. You understand and agree that IONCWallet will push you notifications, and you will follow them exactly. Otherwise, you should take all the responsibilities for any risk, loss, and cost and so on.
  • You get aware and understand that IONCWallet has no obligation to conduct due intelligence for the 3rd party DAPP service or transactions. And you should make rational investment strategies and take the risks by yourself.
  • Complete the ID authentication. When IONCWallet thinks that there is abnormal actions for your transactions, or there is some suspicion about your ID information, or it is necessary to verify your ID card or other documents, please actively check your valid ID or other necessary documents and complete relevant ID verification with IONCWallet
  • Transaction

a) You understand the limitation on the transaction in the IONCWallet in terms of the amount and times, which may be different according to the countries/territories where you make the transaction, regulation requirement, transaction reason, IONCWallet risk control, ID authentication and so on.

b)You understand that due to the irrevocablenature on blockchain operations, when you use the transaction function in the ICONWallet, you should take all the responsibilities for the consequences caused by your mistakes (including but not limited to that you fill in the wrong transaction address, the problem about the server of the transaction nodes selected by yourself).

c)You understand when you use the IONCWallet, it may cause “failure” or “overtime” for the transactions if there is any situation as below:

  • a ) Insufficient balance;
  • b) Insufficient transaction fee;
  • c) Failure blockchain contract execution;
  • d ) Exceed the regulated payment amount required from the regulation authorities, IONCWallet or the laws.
  • e ) Network, facilities and other technical failure;
  • f ) Blockchain network congestion, failure and other reasons, which make the transaction get abandoned
  • g ) Your address or the counterpart’s address is recognized as special address, like high-risk address, exchange address, ICO address, Token address and so on.
  • You understand IONCWallet only provides you the transaction software, and after you complete transaction with IONCWallet, the community has fulfilled all the obligations in the service. And the community will not take any responsibility for other dispute and controversy
  • Compliance and regulation. You understand to follow relevant laws, regulations and national policies when using IONCWallet or making transactions on DAPP listed on IONCWallet.
  • Announcement. IONCWallet will push announcements to you via website, emails, SMS, phone calls, message center, pop-ups and client messages and so on. The information includes the transaction status, or some reminder to ask you to make some operation, please always pay attention on the information.
  • Service fee and tax obligation:

a)IONCWallet will not ask for any service or processing fees right now, and the rules will be announced later if there is any fee in the future;

b)You need to pay miner fee when using IONCWallet to make transactions, and you can decide how much to pay. The miner fee is received by the relevant blockchain system.

c)You understand under some particular circumstance, due to the instability of your network, it may cause the transaction failure, but the blockchain system will also charge the miner fees.

d) You need to pay for all the taxes and other related cost if it is applicable when you make transactions in the IONCWallet.

5. Risk Disclaimer

5.1、You understand that due to the laws and regulations in the cryptocurrency filed are not completed, the cryptocurrencies may have great risks that they cannot keep the promise, technical instability and so on. In addition, the price volatility of cryptocurrencies are much higher than other financial assets. We kindly remind that you should choose to hold or trade any cryptocurrency according to your financial status and risk preference. The marketcap information provided by IONCWallet only grasps part of the cryptocurrency price information from the exchanges, and it does not represent the latest market information or price.

5.2、When using IONCWallet services, if you and your counterpart doesn’t follow the agreement on the information on related websites, transactions, payment page, IONCWallet doesn’t guarantee the transaction could be done successfully, and IONCWallet will not take any responsibility for the losses. If the situation mentioned really happens, and the payment has been transferred to your or your counterpart’s IONCWallet or 3rd wallet, you understand that due to the “irreversible” nature of blockchain, you and your counterpart will take all the relevant risks and consequences.

5.3、When you use the 3rd DAPP services integrated with IONCWallet, for your  protection, the community suggest you to read this agreement and IONCWallet reminders carefully. You should understand the counterpart and product information, evaluate the risks before making the actions. All the transactions on the 3rd party DAPP is your own activities, the effective contract is between you and your counterpart, and it has nothing to do with IONCWallet. IONCWallet will not take any responsibility on the risks, losses and costs for your transaction.

5.4、You should decide by yourself whether the counterpart has full capacity for civil conduct and whether you want to make the transaction and so on. You will take the responsibility for all the risks.

5.5、When you make the transaction, if there is any notification about “failure transaction”, “overtime pack” and other similar messages, you should double confirm via the official channels of the blockchain system, and other blockchain search tools to avoid duplicate transaction; Otherwise, you will take the responsibility for any loss and cost.

5.6、You understand when you create or import wallet on IONCWallet, your Keystore, private key, mnemonic phrase and other information will only be stored on the mobile device, and it will not be stored on IONCWallet or the community server. You can follow the instruction on IONCWallet to change your mobile device. If you haven’t saved or backed up your wallet password, private key, mnemonic phrase, Keystore and other information when you have lost your mobile device, your cryptocurrencies will get lost and the community has no way to get it back, and you need to take the responsibility. If you disclose the wallet password, private key, mnemonic phrase, Keystore and other information when exporting, saving or backing up the information, or the server which contains the information is hacked, your cryptocurrencies will get lost and the community cannot get it back for you, and you need to take all the responsibility.

5.7、We suggest you to back up the information when creating or importing the wallet password, private key, mnemonic phrase and Keystore. We kindly remind you don’t use the ways as below to back up your information: screenshot, email, notebook, SMS, wechat, QQ and other electronic methods. We suggest you to write down the mnemonic phrase and Keystore on the paper notebook, and at the same time, you can also put the electronic data in the password manager.

5.8、We suggest you to use IONCWallet under secured network, and make sure your mobile device doesn’t get Root to avoid potential risks.

5.9、Please be aware of the frauds from others which are not IONCWallet official when you are using our service. You are encouraged to inform us if you find any suspicious actions.

  1. Service change, interruption and termination

6.1、You agree that the community can temporarily stop providing some service function now or in the future or open new service function to guarantee independent business operating right. When there is any feature added or reduced, it means you still agree on this agreement or revised clauses on this agreement as long as you still use the service provided by the community.

6.2、To secure your cryptocurrencies and avoid the mistakes or potential risks when you use the IONCWallet without blockchain fundamental knowledge, you have to pass the Competence Assessment Questionnaire and get the qualified score beforeit is available for you to use IONCWallet service. Otherwise, the community has the right to restrict or refuse to provide you with partial or full service function.

6.3、You understand that the community will stop service if there is any situation as below:

a)Service interruption due to facility and blockchain system maintenance, upgrade, fault, communication interruption and other technical issues.

b)Due to force majeure factors such as typhoons, earthquakes, tsunamis, floods, blackouts, wars or terrorist attacks, viruses, Trojans, hacker attacks, system instability or government behavior, the community system cannot provide services or the community reasonably believes that there will be a greater risk of continuing to provide services;

c)Other situations beyond the control of the community.

6.4、When there is any situation below, the community could suspend or terminate some or all of the functions of your IONCWallet.

a)User death;

b)Steal other’s wallet information or mobile device;

c)Provide false information when you fill in personal information, and it is not yourself who complete the competence assessment questionnaire;

d)Refuse the forced software upgrade launched by the community to improve the features of IONCWallet;

e)Use IONCWallet for illegal or criminal activities;

f)Interfere other users to use the IONCWallet.

g)Pretend to be community employees or managers;

h)Attack, hack, change or any other way to threaten the normal operation of community computation system.

i)Use IONCWallet to promote spam;

j)Spread rumors and damage the reputation of the community and IONCWallet;

k)illegal action, or other action which has violated the agreement, and other situations that the community thinks it necessary to pause the feature.

6.5、You have the right to extract all the wallet information when the service relationship between you and the community has been altered, interrupted and stopped.

7. Your commitment to legally use community services

7.1、You should follow the he law and regulations of People's Republic of China and your resident country and territory. You should not use IONCWallet and community service with any illegal purpose.

7.2、You should not use IONCWallet for any illegal behavior or criminal, including but not limited to:

a) Against the basic principles established by the Constitution, compromise national security, disclose state secrets, subvert the state regime and undermine the state unit;

b) Engage in any illegal or criminal action, including, but not limited to, money laundering, illegal fund-raising, etc.

c)Connect to the community service, collect or process content provided by the community by using any automated program, software, engine, web crawler, web page analysis tool, data mining or similar tools in order to interfere with or attempt to interfere with any user. Or any other action to connect to the community service.

d) Provide gambling information or entice others to participate in gambling;

e)Hack other’s IONCWallet for cryptocurrencies;

f) Conduct transactions that do not conform to the transaction rules claimed by the counterparty, or that are untrue;

g) Engage in any action which may damage IONCWallet service system, data and so on;

h) Any other action which is illegal or considered as inappropriate by the community.

7.3、You understand and agree that if you violate the relevant laws (including but not limited to customs and tax regulations) or the provisions of this Agreement and it causes any loss to the community, any claim from 3rd parties and penalty from the Administration Department, you should compensate the community, including reasonable attorney fees.

7.4、You promise to pay the community service fee on time (if any), otherwise the community has the right to suspend or stop offering service to you.

  1. Privacy Policy

The community attaches great importance to the protection of users' privacy, and please refer to the updatedIONCWallet privacy policyfor related protection policies.

9. Disclaimer and Limitation of liability

9.1、The community only takes responsibility for the obligations mentioned in this agreement.

9.2、You understand and agree that the community can only provide service based on current technical skills in legal limits. The community will not take any responsibility if the IONCWallet does not work properly due to the reasons as below:

a)IONCWallet system maintenance or upgrade;

b) Force Majeure causes such as typhoons, earthquakes, floods, lightning or terrorist attacks;

c) Failure on software and hardware, communication line, electricity line of your mobile device;

d)Improper operation or use community service without authorization and recognization;

e)Virus, Trojan horse, malicious attack, network congestion, system instability, system or device failure, communication failure, power failure, bank, government behavior and so on;

f) Other reasons which are not caused by the community.

  1. The community will not take responsibility for the cases as below:

a) Cryptocurrency loss caused by the reasons that user lost the mobile device, deleted of the unbacked IONCWallet, deleted of the unbacked wallet, and the wallet was hacked or user forgot the wallet password, private key, mnemonic phrase and Keystore.

b)Cryptocurrency loss caused by the reasons that user disclosed the wallet password, private key, mnemonic phrase, Keystore, or authorized others to use his/her mobile device or IONCWallet, or downloaded the IONCWallet application from other resources other than the official channel.

c) Cryptocurrency loss due to user’s error operation (including but not limited to that you fill in the wrong transaction address, the selected transaction node has problem on the server, and so on);

d)Cryptocurrency loss due to the reason that user doesn’t understand the properties of blockchain technology and make error operation.

e)The community has some deviation on the blockchain transaction record due to time lag, system instability and other reasons;

f) Risks and consequences when users are operating the 3rd DAPPs.

9.4、You understand IONCWallet only works as the cryptocurrency management tool for you, and the community cannot control the product and service quality, security and legitimacy, information authenticity and accuracy, and the ability whether the counterpart can fulfil obligations under agreements with you of the 3rd party DAPP. Whatever you have done on the 3rd party DAPP is your own action, and the binding contractual relationship is established between you and your counterpart and has nothing to do with the IONCWallet. The community reminds you to ensure the reality, legitimacy and effectiveness after prudent judgment. You need to take all the responsibilities on any risk between you and other 3rd party exchange as well.

9.5、The community may provide service for you and your counterpart, and you agree to exempt any actual or potential conflict from this action of the community, and are not allowed to argue that there are legal flaws in the provision of services by communities, And it also does not aggravate the responsibility or duty of care of the community.

  1. The community will not give the promises as below:

a)the community can meet all your requirements;

b)All the technology, product, service and information gained from the community will meet your expectation;

c)The community guarantees the timeliness, accuracy, integrity and reliability about the cryptocurrency market information grasped from the 3rd party exchanges;

d)All the parties in the transaction on IONCWallet will timely fulfil the obligations agreed with you.

9.7、In any case, the total liability for breach of contract shall not exceed 1) 0.1 ETH; or 2) 500RMB for the community, and take the higher one as final result.

9.8、You understand the IONCWallet is only the tool for users to manage cryptocurrencies and show the transactions, and the community will not provide any suggestion about law, tax and investment. You should turn to the experts for law, tax and investment suggestions, and the community will not take any responsibility if you have investment or data loss when using our service.

9.9、You understand we may change our user entrance standard and restrict our service to some particular groups according to the China policy and regulation,

10. Competed agreement

10.1、The agreement consists ofIONCWallet service agreement,IONCWallet privacy policy andsome rules published (including thehelp center) by the community from time to time.

10.2、It will not affect the effectiveness of other content in the agreement if some content is considered as illegal or invalid by the authorities.

10.3、 Any translation of this agreement is for user’s convenience, and it will not change the clauses in the agreement. If there is any conflict between the Chinese and non-Chinese version, the original version in Chinese shall prevail.

11. Protection of intellectual property

IONCWallet community develops the application and keeps all the intellectual property. The intellectual property of all the content shown in the IONCWallet (including text, announcement, article, video, voice audio, picture, document, message, material, brand or logo) belongs to the community or 3rd party patentee. Users can only sue IONCWallet application and the content to store and manage the cryptocurrencies. Any other person is not allowed to use, modify, translate, copy, spread, change, distribute, and publish the application and content mentioned above without the written consent of the community and 3rd party patentee.

12. Application of Law and Controversy Resolution

12.1、Effectiveness, explanation, revise, implementation and controversy resolution of the agreement and other revised versions are all applicable to Law of the People's Republic of China, and if there no legal provisions, it should follow the international business and (or) industry practices.

12.2、If you have any controversy or conflict with the community, it should be settled through friendly consultation at first, if it doesn’t work, any part can turn to the local People's court.

13. Others

13.1、If you are users out of the People's Republic of China, it is required to understand fully and follow the related laws, regulations and policies in your jurisdiction and community.

13.2、You can contact us with submitting feedback on the IONCWallet if there is any problem when you are using the community service.

13.3、You can check this agreement in the IONCWallet, and the community encourages you to read through the agreement every time when you visit IONCWallet.

  1. The agreement is valid from 1st Dec 2018.

You should follow the updated announcement and rules published by the community from time to time if it is not covered in the agreement.

IONChain Development Community  2019.5.7
